languages.text:
Whenever the wearer suffers an attack from a daemon or {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) to all adjacent enemies.
All burning effects inflicted by the wearer deal double {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if they target daemons or psykers.

traits.locale_text:
Whenever the wearer suffers an attack from a daemon or {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) to all adjacent enemies.
All burning effects inflicted by the wearer deal double damage if they target daemons or psykers.

Whenever the wearer suffers an attack from a daemon or {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) to all adjacent enemies.
All burning effects inflicted by the wearer deal double {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if they target daemons or psykers.

Whenever the wearer suffers an attack from a daemon or {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) to all adjacent enemies.
All burning effects inflicted by the wearer deal double {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if they target daemons or psykers.

languages.text:
每当装备者遭到恶魔攻击，或承受{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}时，都会对邻近所有敌人施加{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}（8）。
装备者造成的所有燃烧效果，都会对恶魔与灵能者造成双倍{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer suffers an attack from a daemon or {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) to all adjacent enemies.
All burning effects inflicted by the wearer deal double {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if they target daemons or psykers.

traits.locale_text:
每当装备者遭到恶魔攻击，或承受{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}时，都会对邻近所有敌人施加{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}（8）。
装备者造成的所有燃烧效果，都会对恶魔与灵能者造成双倍伤害。

languages.text:
Когда персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урон{/g} или его атакует демон, персонаж накладывает {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} (8) на противников на соседних клетках.
Все эффекты горения, наложенные персонажем, наносят удвоенный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} демонам и псайкерам.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer suffers an attack from a daemon or {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) to all adjacent enemies.
All burning effects inflicted by the wearer deal double {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if they target daemons or psykers.

traits.locale_text:
Когда персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урон{/g} или его атакует демон, персонаж накладывает {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} (8) на противников на соседних клетках.
Все эффекты горения, наложенные персонажем, наносят удвоенный урон демонам и псайкерам.

Когда персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урон{/g} или его атакует демон, персонаж накладывает {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} (8) на противников на соседних клетках.
Все эффекты горения, наложенные персонажем, наносят удвоенный урон демонам и псайкерам.

languages.text:
使用者がディーモンからの攻撃または{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}歪みダメージ{/g}を受けるたびに、隣接するすべての敵に{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}(8)を与える。
使用者がディーモンや異能者をターゲットとする場合、付与する炎上効果の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}がすべて2倍になる。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer suffers an attack from a daemon or {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) to all adjacent enemies.
All burning effects inflicted by the wearer deal double {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if they target daemons or psykers.

traits.locale_text:
使用者がディーモンからの攻撃または{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}ワープダメージ{/g}を受けるたびに、隣接するすべての敵に{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}（8）を与える。
使用者がディーモンや異能者をターゲットとする場合、与える炎上効果すべてが2倍のダメージになる。

languages.text:
Cada vez que el portador recibe un ataque de un daemon o {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g}, inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} (8) a todos los enemigos adyacentes.
Todos los efectos de quemaduras infligidos por el portador causan el doble de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} si van dirigidos a daemons o psíquicos.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer suffers an attack from a daemon or {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) to all adjacent enemies.
All burning effects inflicted by the wearer deal double {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if they target daemons or psykers.

traits.locale_text:
Cada vez que el portador recibe un ataque de un daemon o {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g}, inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} (8) a todos los enemigos adyacentes.
Todos los efectos de quemaduras infligidos por el portador causan el doble de daño si van dirigidos a daemons o psíquicos.

languages.text:
Wenn der Träger von einem Dämon attackiert wird oder {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g} erleidet, verursacht er bei allen angrenzenden Feinden {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} (8).
Alle vom Träger verursachten Verbrennen-Effekte verursachen doppelten {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, be iDämonen oder Psionikern.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer suffers an attack from a daemon or {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) to all adjacent enemies.
All burning effects inflicted by the wearer deal double {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if they target daemons or psykers.

traits.locale_text:
Immer wenn der Träger einen Angriff von einem Dämon oder {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g} erleidet, verursacht er bei allen angrenzenden Feinden {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} (8).
Alle vom Träger verursachten Verbrennen-Effekte fügen doppelten Schaden zu, wenn sie Dämonen oder Psioniker anvisieren.

languages.text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur est attaqué par un démon ou qu'il subit des {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts du Warp{/g}, il inflige l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} (8) à tous les ennemis adjacents.
Tous les effets Combustion appliqués par l'utilisateur infligent le double de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} s'ils ciblent des démons ou des psykers.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer suffers an attack from a daemon or {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) to all adjacent enemies.
All burning effects inflicted by the wearer deal double {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if they target daemons or psykers.

traits.locale_text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur est attaqué par un démon ou qu'il subit des {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts warp{/g}, il inflige l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} (8) à tous les ennemis adjacents.
Tous les effets Combustion appliqués par l'utilisateur infligent le double de dégâts s'ils ciblent des démons ou des psykers.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur est attaqué par un démon ou qu'il subit des {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts warp{/g}, il inflige l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} (8) à tous les ennemis adjacents.
Tous les effets Combustion appliqués par l'utilisateur infligent le double de dégâts s'ils ciblent des démons ou des psykers.

languages.text:
Takan kişi, bir iblisin saldırısına veya {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}öteboyut hasarına{/g} uğradığında bitişiğindeki tüm düşmanlarda {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g} (8) oluşturur.
Takan kişi, iblis veya ruhsezerleri hedef almışsa oluşturduğu tüm yanma etkileri iki katı {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer suffers an attack from a daemon or {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) to all adjacent enemies.
All burning effects inflicted by the wearer deal double {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if they target daemons or psykers.
